vocabInfos.shortDef: to strike with the fists, beat, torment; (passive) receive a beating, be brutally treated
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to strike with the fists, beat, torment; (passive) receive a beating, be brutally treated
to beat with the fist, buffet, Mt. 26:67; Mk. 14:65; metaphorically to maltreat, treat with excessive force, 1Cor. 4:11; to punish, 1Pet. 2:20; to buffet, fret, afflict, 2Cor. 12:7*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 用拳頭打, 打
2) 折磨 (身體) (林後 12:7)
